TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed HttpResponseSubstitutionCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function HttpResponseSubstitutionCallback(context As HttpContext) As String
type HttpResponseSubstitutionCallback = delegate of HttpContext -> string

param.name: context
param.span: 包含对页的 HTTP 请求信息的 ，该页带有需要缓存后替换的控件。

span.span: The that contains the HTTP request information for the page with the control that requires post-cache substitution.

summary.span: 表示处理缓存后替换的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles post-cache substitution.

returns.span: 在发送到客户端之前插入到缓存的响应的内容。

span.span: The content inserted into the cached response before being sent to the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 委托，结合方法，用于呈现后的缓存内容和控件。The delegate, in combination with the method, is used for rendering post-cache content for the and controls. 有关控制，请使用属性来指定要时调用的回调方法的名称控件执行。For the control, use the property to specify the name of the callback method to invoke when the control executes. 您指定的回调方法必须是静态方法的页上，也包含在用户控件上控件。The callback method that you specify must be a static method on the page or on the user control that contains the control. 回调方法的签名必须匹配的签名该委托使用参数并返回一个字符串。The signature for the callback method must match the signature for an delegate that takes an parameter and returns a string. 有关控件，呈现都独立于页面缓存，除非事件处理程序提供有关事件。For the control, rendering is independent of the page caching unless an event handler is provided for the event. 如果没有事件处理程序存在，则缓存后替换用于呈现内容。If no event handler is present, post-cache substitution is used to render the content. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何添加以编程方式向输出缓存网页的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to add a control programmatically to an output-cached Web page. 加载页时向用户在标签中显示当前日期和时间。When the page loads, the current date and time are displayed to the user in a label. 本部分的页面缓存并更新每隔 60 秒。This section of the page is cached and updated every 60 seconds. 当控件执行时，它将调用`GetCurrentDateTime`方法，它必须与匹配的签名委托。When the control executes, it calls the `GetCurrentDateTime` method, which must match the signature for the delegate. 返回的字符串`GetCurrentDateTime`方法显示给用户。The string that is returned by the `GetCurrentDateTime` method is displayed to the user. 此部分中的页未缓存，并更新每次刷新页面。This section of the page is not cached and is updated each time the page is refreshed. 属性的控件获取或设置回调方法的名称。The property of the control gets or sets the name of the callback method. [!code-aspx-csharp[SubstitutionCstr#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SubstitutionCstr/CS/substitutioncstrcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[SubstitutionCstr#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SubstitutionCstr/VB/substitutioncstrvb.aspx#1)]

related.span: 缓存 ASP.NET 页面的部分

span.span: Caching Portions of an ASP.NET Page
